org.drip.analytics.definition

Interface Curve

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConstantForwardHazard, ConstantForwardRate, CreditCurve, CubicForwardRate, DerivedFXBasis, DerivedFXForward, DerivedZeroRate, DiscountCurve, FXBasisCurve, FXForwardCurve, HyperbolicTensionForwardRate, LinearForwardRate, PolynomialSplineDF, ZeroCurve

    public interface Curve
    This is the interface defining the core bootstrapping methods – setting/bumping specific nodes, setting flat values across all nodes, retrieving specific/collective instrument/node quotes.
